price: بىزدىن مۇسۇلمانلار ۋە ھەق يولدىن چىققۇچىلارمۇ بار، مۇسۇلمان بولغانلار توغرا يولنى ئىزدىگەن بولىدۇ[14].
arabic: وَأَنَّا مِنَّا ٱلۡمُسۡلِمُونَ وَمِنَّا ٱلۡقَٰسِطُونَۖ فَمَنۡ أَسۡلَمَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ تَحَرَّوۡاْ رَشَدٗا

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-annā minnā al-mus'limūna waminnā al-qāsiṭūna faman aslama fa-ulāika taḥarraw rashadan
